contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} [[File:VictoriaCrossRange.jpg|thumbnail]] The '''Victoria Cross Ranges''' ({{Coord|52|55|N|118|18|W|name=Victoria Cross Ranges-S}} to {{Coord|53|05|N|118|30|W|name=Victoria Cross Ranges-N}}) are a set of [[mountain range]]s in the [[Canadian Rockies]], located to the northwest of [[Jasper, Alberta|Jasper]]. Of the 19 peaks contained within this range, six are named after Canadian recipients of the [[Victoria Cross]]. This range includes the following mountains and peaks: {| border=0 class="wikitable" cellspacing=3 style="margin-left:3em" ! align=left width=120|Mountain/Peak !! metres !! feet !! namesake |- |[[Snaring Mountain]] || 2,931 ||align=right| 9,617 |- |[[Mount Bridgland]] || 2,930 ||align=right| 9,613 || [[Morrison Bridgland]] |- |[[Mount Mahood]] || 2,896 ||align=right| 9,502 |- |[[Consort Mountain]] || 2,883 ||align=right| 9,459 |- |[[Mount Oliver (Alberta)|Mount Oliver]]|| 2,865 ||align=right| 9,400 |- |[[Mount BeauprÃ©]] || 2,778 ||align=right| 9,115 |- |[[Monarch Mountain (Alberta)|Monarch Mountain]] || 2,777 ||align=right| 9,111 |- |[[Pyramid Mountain (Alberta)|Pyramid Mountain]]|| 2,766 ||align=right| 9,075 |- |[[Mount McKean]] || 2,743 ||align=right| 9,000 || [[George Burdon McKean]] |- |[[Buttress Mountain]] || 2,685 ||align=right| 8,809 |- |[[Mount Griesbach]] || 2,682 ||align=right| 8,800 || [[William Antrobus Griesbach]] |- |[[Mount Kinross]] || 2,650 ||align=right| 8,695 || [[Cecil John Kinross]] |- |[[Mount Zengel]] || 2,630 ||align=right| 8,629 || [[Raphael Louis Zengel]] |- |[[Mount Henry (Canada)|Mount Henry]] || 2,629 ||align=right| 8,626 |- |[[Cairngorm (Alberta)|Cairngorm]]|| 2,610 ||align=right| 8,563 |- |[[Mount Kerr (Alberta)|Mount Kerr]] || 2,560 ||align=right| 8,399 || [[John Chipman Kerr]] |- |[[Emigrants Mountain]] || 2,553 ||align=right| 8,376 |- |[[Elysium Mountain]] || 2,446 ||align=right| 8,025 |- |[[Mount Pattison]] || 2,316 ||align=right| 7,600 || [[John George Pattison]] |} ==See also== *[[Ranges of the Canadian Rockies]] {{Canadian Rockies|state=collapsed}} [[Category:Mountain ranges of Alberta]] [[Category:Canadian Rockies]] {{Alberta-geo-stub}}
